channel.title: How to make PVP zones?
channel.description:
Hey, can someone tell me how to make PvP zones?
Like, in the Varrock bank is Safe, but out side is PvP?
Thank you :D

item.title: How to make PVP zones?
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

I Vain I:

^ He said that was for Czar bases.

i know but iharry needs it for a PI, so i told him where it is.

Read full topic

item.title: How to make PVP zones?
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“owner ruthless, post:4, topic:286604”]I Think i know how to well im gonna try to tell you.

NOTE: helps if ur using czar

First open up client.java

and search ( ctrl + f ):

Once u have found it look at the bit saying:

ABOVE THAT ADD:

NOW lets look at the code u have put in:

the first " #### " basiclly means ur first x co ordinate of your PVP zone replace that " #### " into the co-ordinate u want. BASICALLY UR DRAWING A BOX THAT IS THE TOP LEFT CORNER X CO-ORDINATE

Now this gets a little bit harder…

see the last " #### " that is your top left corner’s Y CO-ORDINATE so change it to the one u want

NOW see the SECOND " #### "that is your bottom right x co ordinate of ur pvp zone box change it to the one u want

Now we are getting to the end!

NOW see the THIRD " #### " that is your bottom right y co ordinate of ur pvp zone so change it to the one u want!

SAVE AND COMPILE IF IT DOESNT WORK OR U GET ERRORS REPLY TO ME![/quote]

it’s in player.java not client.java

Read full topic

item.title: How to make PVP zones?
item.dc:creator: @owner_ruthless owner ruthless
item.description:
@owner_ruthless wrote:

I Think i know how to well im gonna try to tell you.

NOTE: helps if ur using czar

First open up client.java

and search ( ctrl + f ):

public boolean inWild() {

Once u have found it look at the bit saying:

|| heightLevel == 1) {

ABOVE THAT ADD:

                || (absX >= #### && absX <= #### && absY >= #### && absY <= ####)

NOW lets look at the code u have put in:

the first " #### " basiclly means ur first x co ordinate of your PVP zone replace that " #### " into the co-ordinate u want. BASICALLY UR DRAWING A BOX THAT IS THE TOP LEFT CORNER X CO-ORDINATE

Now this gets a little bit harder…

see the last " #### " that is your top left corner’s Y CO-ORDINATE so change it to the one u want

NOW see the SECOND " #### "that is your bottom right x co ordinate of ur pvp zone box change it to the one u want

Now we are getting to the end!

NOW see the THIRD " #### " that is your bottom right y co ordinate of ur pvp zone so change it to the one u want!

SAVE AND COMPILE IF IT DOESNT WORK OR U GET ERRORS REPLY TO ME!

Read full topic
